commands.autorelog_error_singleplayer: AutoRelog does not do anything in singleplayer
autorelog.midnightconfig.title: AutoRelog
autorelog.midnightconfig.interval.toolti: The interval between reconnection attempts in seconds.
autorelog.midnightconfig.maxAttempts.too: The maximum amount of attempts AutoRelog should make to reconnect. Set to 0 for unlimited attempts. (be sure the server admin is okay with this though!)
autorelog.midnightconfig.afkDelay.toolti: The delay in seconds before AutoRelog activates when AFK.
autorelog.midnightconfig.mode.tooltip: Automatic: AutoReconnect will automatically activate after being AFK longer than the AFK delay. Manual: Type the command `/autorelog` to (de)activate AutoRelog.
